Html:
Hello, im using chirp extensively for some time.

 

And i face some problems on the day-to-day development.

I was just wondering how could i join to help on the development of this wonderfull tool.

Also, one of the ideas i have is enabling some kind of formatting on the filename of the compiled css or js (with timestamp or anything like that).

 

Greetings, Amadeus.

Create fork.

When work don send pull request.
